afterDate.description: The afterDate parameter of the request.

beforeDate.description: The beforeDate parameter of the request.

limit.description: The limit parameter of the request.

next.description: The URL of the request that will fetch the next page of results.

offset.description: The offset parameter of the request.

previous.description: The URL of the request that will fetch the previous page of results.

sort.description: The sort parameter of the request.
